q: defenses have their work cut out for them trying to get to those guys,'' said John Kuhn , a running back who broke into the NFL taking handoffs from Ben Roethlisberger , but now plays behind Aaron Rodgers . When defenses get to them, it's not over. They've got to get them to the ground. Against Atlanta, Aaron Rodgers made like four or five guys miss in the pocket on several different plays. He's phenomenal. He's playing at a high level right now. But with Ben Roethlisberger , you can't tackle him. He's a beast back there. I think people underestimate how Ben Roethlisberger and strong he actually is.
